name: qcleaner
short_description: qcleaner is an addon perl utility for mail servers and exchangers that run qmail with qmail-scanner.  It cleans the queue by scanning the directory for bounces, then checks if the message is either spam (as tagged by spamassassin) or a qmail-scanner repo
